text: Aleksandr Georgievich Martyshkin (, 26 August 1943 – 29 October 2021) was a Russian rower. He competed for the Soviet Union in the 1968 Summer Olympics and in the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Moscow. He died on 29 October 2021 in Moscow, aged 78.Ушел из жизни, Мартышкин Александр Георгиевич ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet rowers Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Aleksandr Martyshkin
